summary:
The Pentagon is a huge building in Virginia where the United States military leaders work. It was built quickly during World War II and is the second-largest office building globally. The Pentagon has five sides and floors, with long corridors and a big central plaza.

In 2001, a tragic event occurred when a plane crashed into it during the 9/11 attacks, causing damage and loss of lives. The building was repaired, and a memorial was added to honor those who died.
title: The Pentagon
